direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve processing and transforming nodes into different formats (regex in match, string in rewriteToRegex).
The match method relies on the parse method to generate the AST which is then used in the matching process.
Both methods perform matching operations, though on different types of inputs (String in match, CharSequence in TreeRegexp's match).
The match method constructs arguments using the build method, which is crucial for the final output of the match method.
The match method uses the lookupByTypeName method to find parameter types, which are essential for processing the input text.
